version_description:
This release is all about features that you were asking for!

• Add notes to your work sessions and time off
• Set custom week start
• Make your breaks count as work
• View total hours for current periods straight from the clock screen

Version 1.4.1 fixes a problem that would cause monthly hours to be incorrect under some circumstances.

Version 1.4.0:
• More export options
• Performance improvements

Bug fixes.

Version 1.5.0:
• iOS 11 and iPhone X are now fully supported
• You can access past timesheets without an upgrade to Flexishift Pro
• Various bugs have been fixed
You can see both weekly and monthly hours at the same time again. Thank you for your feedback!

Version 2.1.1 fixes a bug that was causing Flexishift Pro purchase status to be incorrectly reported for some users.
New in version 2.1: Flexishift can now remind you to clock in when you arrive at your workplace and to clock out when you leave. We've also enabled full iOS 13 support and made the app completely ad-free.

Version 2.1: Flexishift can now remind you to clock in when you arrive at your workplace and to clock out when you leave. We've also enabled full iOS 13 support and made the app completely ad-free.
Version 2.1.2 brings further improvements.
Flexishift can now track your earnings. We've also made multiple stability, performance and visual improvements.
